entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
